section.title: I18n
section.para: The I18n resource will basically just initiate a null translator. Every application should make use of a translation adapter, even if they are unilingual. By ensuring that a null translator is used, any time a given application needs to migrate to a multilingual website, it needs not to upgrade its code base, just switch to a concrete adapter (e.g: gettext), translate and be done with it.

note.para: The null translator always returns the same string it was asked to translate. When the application migrates into a multilingual one, you only need to switch the adapter.
